mapper.select: select goods_no ,GOODS_NAME ,GOODS_SIZE ,GOODS_TYPE ,GOODS_PRICE ,GOODS_EFFICIENT ,GOODS_FUEL ,BRAND_CODE ,GOODS_CODE from goods where goods_no = #{goodsNo}
mapper.update: update goods set goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_size = #{goodsSize}, goods_type = #{goodsType}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, goods_efficient = #{goodsEfficient}, goods_fuel = #{goodsFuel} where goods_no = #{goodsNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods WHERE brand_code = #{brandCode} AND (goods_price BETWEEN #{goodsPrice1} AND #{goodsPrice2}) AND goods_size = #{goodsSize} AND goods_efficient = #{goodsEfficient} AND goods_Fuel = #{goodsFuel} AND rownum <= 1;
